item.title: About
item.author: emma.fackelmann@gmail.com (Emma Fackelmann)
item.description: Owner & Psychotherapist Emma Fackelmann Emma is the founder of Everybody’s Talking and is currently the head psychotherapist. Over the past nine years, she has worked in mental health and addictions, furthering her career development in psychotherapy since 2018. Her theoretical practices are integratively grounded in trauma-informed care, humanistic, existential, psychodynamic, person-centered, biopsychosocial, and attachment theories. item.title: In a Crisis
item.author: emma.fackelmann@gmail.com (Emma Fackelmann)
item.description: I am not a crisis responder and my services are focused on assisting clients that are not actively experiencing suicidal tendencies. If you are currently experiencing a crisis, the following resources may prove useful: Distress Center Halton Distress Center Niagara Community Resources Barrett Centre for Crisis Support Crisis Outreach and Support Team
